comment.text: This translation key is used to display a price format in a Portal Settings page, specifically showing the cost per unit in a currency format. It appears as part of a plan information component and requires translation into multiple languages. Translators should replace "{currency}" and "{amount}" with local currency symbols and numerical values, respectively.

usage.context: {t("PriceForEach", { currency: formatWalletCurrency(storagePriceIncrement, 2), amount: getConvertedSize(t, storageSizeIncrement), })}
